content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in bari on september 6 2016 the case number is 3191 but no further details about the parties or the case are provided the text states that the heirs have been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings to equitalia sud spa totaling €397200 the court has made a final decision on a claim brought by several parties against equitalia sud spa ordering the dissolution of a community hereditary property specifically a house the court has determined the ownership shares of each party involved and has ordered the transfer of shares to some parties along with the obligation to pay certain sums of money to other joint owners the court has also awarded the entire estate to some parties and has assigned the costs of the proceedings to them additionally the court has convicted all parties involved to jointly and severally pay the costs of the proceedings to equitalia sud spa the plaintiffs brought a lawsuit against the defendants and equitalia sud spa claiming that equitalia sud spa had registered a mortgage on a property they inherited the defendants did not respond to the lawsuit and default was declared equitalia sud spa requested to enforce their security interest on the property the courtappointed an expert to determine the value and divisibility of the property the experts report concluded that the property could be divided conveniently the court granted the plaintiffs request and ordered the division of the property with nonassignee heirs required to pay a balance to the assignee heirs the court also acknowledged the legal mortgage registered by equitalia sud spa and allowed them to assert their claims against the heir the court ordered the payment of legal costs by the parties involved a ruling was made on a summons application filed on june 12 2013 ordering the dissolution of a hereditary property community the ownership shares of the property were determined for each party involved and the ruling ordered the transfer of shares to the joint owners with each party having to pay a specific amount to adjust the shares the entire estate was transferred to some parties and a legal mortgage was registered for a specific amount due to equitalia sud spa the costs of the proceedings were awarded to all parties involved and they were ordered to pay the respective shares of the estates costs jointly and severally convicted to pay the costs of the proceedings in favor of equitalia sud spa
